title: Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, Pair up to 100 Speakers,IPX7 Waterproof Speaker Wireless Bluetooth-V5.3, HiFi Stereo Sound, 1100mins Playtime, Portable Speaker for Home, Outdoor, Party
descriptions:
Turn every moment into a soundtrack with Raymate Bluetooth Speakers—the portable powerhouse built for home hangouts, outdoor adventures, and unforgettable parties.

- Immersive HiFi stereo: Dual drivers and a powerful amplifier deliver rich, balanced sound without distortion, even at high volume.
- Epic party mode: Pair up to 100 speakers for room-filling, yard-shaking, wall-to-wall audio.
- Go-anywhere durability: IPX7 waterproof and an integrated protective structure guard against rain, dust, splashes, and snow.
- All-day playtime: 3600mAh battery keeps the music going for up to 1100 minutes (15+ hours). Recharge fast with USB-C.
- Next-gen connectivity: Bluetooth 5.3 ensures ultra-stable, low-latency connections with effortless pairing.
- Designed to stand out: A sleek golden-ratio cylindrical body in pure, modern colors looks as good as it sounds.
- Effortless control: The integrated Turntable button lets you adjust volume and tracks with intuitive precision.

From backyard BBQs to beach days to living-room lounges, Raymate delivers powerful, portable sound made to move with you—and keep the party going. Plug in, pair up, press play.
